text: 17|59|nam drstantannal ayakkunnatin namukk tatas'samayat purvvikanmar attaram drstantannale nisedhicc tallikkalannu ennat matramanâ€Œ. nam thamud samudayattin pratyaksa drstantamayikkeant ottakatte nalkukayuntayi. ennitt avar atinre karyattil akramam pravartticcu. bhayappetuttan matramakunnu nam drstantannal ayakkunnatâ€Œ
